io.netty.handler.proxy

Class Socks4ProxyHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelDuplexHandler
          • io.netty.handler.proxy.ProxyHandler
            • io.netty.handler.proxy.Socks4ProxyHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelInboundHandler, ChannelOutboundHandler

    public final class Socks4ProxyHandler
extends ProxyHandler
    Handler that establishes a blind forwarding proxy tunnel using SOCKS4 protocol.
